610710.name: Sea Of Secrets
610710.description:
Your family has been poor for generations, and now you have grown into manhood with one goal: free them from poverty and struggle. Take control of Jack as you begin a journey with one goal...and it becomes something very different that shakes your family to its foundations.

Features:

  • An exploration RPG with over 150 items to use and equip, random loot and over 25 monsters to fight. Each game is different.

  • Custom designed, detailed parallax maps with immersive sound and music design throughout. Over 4-6 hours of gameplay on average.

  • Over 20 skills to learn, each with different effects and advantages. No 'magic' used here, this is a strictly practical, real-world based RPG.

  • Over 20 quests to complete, many important to progress in the game, with on-screen tracker. Strong writing and narrative twists used to propel the story forward.

  • OTB based combat increases strategy needed to win fights consistently.

Enter the world of pirates, treasure and adventure today with Sea Of Secrets!
610710.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
